TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ComponentGlyph extends System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph

remarks.format: ## Remarks The ComponentGlyph class contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ComponentGlyph.RelatedComponent%2A> property, which points back to the glyph's related component. This property can be used to trace <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects back to their component, such as during drag operations.

Docs.summary: Indicates whether a mouse click at the specified point should be handled by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ComponentGlyph">.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> is associated with ; otherwise, `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default implementation does nothing and returns `null`.
